snippet: Banning thimerosal, a mercury compound used as a preservative in vaccines, would devastate public health efforts in developing countries, warn a group of doctors and experts.
abstract: Group of prominent doctors and public health experts warns in articles to be published in journal Pediatrics that banning thimerosal, mercury compound used as preservative in vaccines, will have devastating effects on health efforts in developing countries.
lead_paragraph: Banning thimerosal, a mercury compound used as a preservative in vaccines, would devastate public health efforts in developing countries, warn a group of doctors and experts.

headline.seo: Experts Say Thimerosal Ban Would Imperil Global Health Efforts
headline.main: Vaccine Rule Is Said to Hurt Health Efforts
headline.print_headline: Vaccine Rule Is Said to Hurt Health Efforts
